0.text: Passive - Doom: Periodically, Vex empowers her next basic ability to  knock down and  fear enemies hit for 0.75 / 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 (based on level) seconds, during which they are  slowed by 60% − 99% (based on distance from Vex). If  Looming Darkness triggers Doom, enemies hit will  flee from the epicenter instead.Doom's cooldown  resets upon respawning.
0.html:
Passive - Doom: Periodically, Vex empowers her next basic ability to knock down and fear enemies hit for 0.75 / 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 (based on level) seconds, during which they are slowed by 60% − 99% (based on distance from Vex). If Looming Darkness triggers Doom, enemies hit will flee from the epicenter instead.
Doom's cooldown  resets upon respawning.
markedPassages: knock down
fear
slowed
Looming Darkness
flee
resets

1.text: Innate - Gloom: Nearby enemy  champions and  monsters that  dash or  blink will be marked with Gloom for 6 seconds. Vex's next basic attack or basic ability hit will detonate the mark, the basic attack becoming  non-projectile.  Looming Darkness will also inflict Gloom, but cannot detonate it.
1.html: Innate - Gloom: Nearby enemy champions and monsters that dash or blink will be marked with Gloom for 6 seconds. Vex's next basic attack or basic ability hit will detonate the mark, the basic attack becoming non-projectile. Looming Darkness will also inflict Gloom, but cannot detonate it.
markedPassages: champions
monsters
dash
blink
non-projectile
Looming Darkness

2.text: Gloom's detonation deals 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 20% AP)  bonus magic damage and  refunds 25% of Doom's cooldown. Against  monsters, this instead deals 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) damage and  refunds 10% of Doom's cooldown.
2.html: Gloom's detonation deals 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and  refunds 25% of Doom's cooldown. Against monsters, this instead deals 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) damage and  refunds 10% of Doom's cooldown.
markedPassages: refunds
monsters
refunds

0.text: Active: Vex launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but also narrows itself.
0.html: Active: Vex launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but also narrows itself.

0.text: Active: Vex emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  shielding herself for 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Vex emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and shielding herself for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shielding

0.text: Active: Vex tosses her Shadow to explode at the target location, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The explosion widens based on cast distance.
0.html: Active: Vex tosses her Shadow to explode at the target location, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The explosion widens based on cast distance.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Vex sends her Shadow in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Vex sends her Shadow in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Shadow stops upon hitting an enemy  champion, marking and  revealing them for 4 seconds. Shadow Surge can be recast while the target is marked.
1.html: Shadow stops upon hitting an enemy champion, marking and revealing them for 4 seconds. Shadow Surge can be recast while the target is marked.
markedPassages: champion
revealing

2.text: Recast: Vex  dashes towards the marked target with  displacement immunity. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal magic damage.
2.html: Recast: Vex dashes towards the marked target with displacement immunity. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal magic damage.
markedPassages: dashes
displacement immunity

3.text: If the target dies within 6 seconds of being marked, Vex can cast Shadow Surge again within 12 seconds at no cost after 0.5 seconds.
3.html: If the target dies within 6 seconds of being marked, Vex can cast Shadow Surge again within 12 seconds at no cost after 0.5 seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for 「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

Keywords

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

Passive

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CINDERBLOOM: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a  shield within the last 5 seconds.

Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
